divs: Sighting Detailsmy co-worker and I were standing outside close to 10 pm and we saw a bright round light off in the distance id say within 3 miles, it was bright orange and yellow from where we were standing it was a little bit smaller than a penny it would hover for a few seconds the it would slowly move up and back down. we decided to lean against the building and were as steady as possible to make sure we were no making it up in our heads we watched this thing move up and down and we used the power lines as a reference point from where it was starting to move and where it was stopping, then after about 15 minutes of watching it, it slowly went towards the horizon. there a few choppers out in the distance and a plane flying south no where near where we were looking.
trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There was one other sighting in Tulsa on or around July 18th 2013
